casebody.data:
Dorian E. Pfeifer, Susan D. Payne, Diane Torockio, Richard R. Dailey, Susan M. Peterman, Deborah R. Miller, Linda Blackburn Scott, Ruth Ellen Gallagher, Judith A. Gallagher
v.
Westmoreland County Tax Claim Bureau, BP Mineral Holdings III, LLC, Somerset Minerals, LP, BRC Appalachian Minerals I, LLC NO. 403 WAL 2015 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania April 26, 2016 Appeal from the Commonwealth Court.

Disposition: Denied.
